mapper.insert: INSERT INTO card_transaction (card_id, category_id, approval_no, amount, payment_type, installment_month, transaction_date, store_name, store_name1, store_type, cancel_status, cancel_amount) VALUES (#{cardId}, #{categoryId}, #{approvalNo}, #{amount}, #{paymentType}, #{installmentMonth}, #{transactionDate}, #{storeName}, #{storeName1}, #{storeType}, #{cancelStatus}, #{cancelAmount})

INSERT INTO card_transaction (card_id, category_id, approval_no, amount, payment_type, installment_month, transaction_date, store_name, store_name1, store_type, cancel_status, cancel_amount) VALUES
(#{tx.cardId}, #{tx.categoryId}, #{tx.approvalNo}, #{tx.amount}, #{tx.paymentType}, #{tx.installmentMonth}, #{tx.transactionDate}, #{tx.storeName}, #{tx.storeName1}, #{tx.storeType}, #{tx.cancelStatus}, #{tx.cancelAmount})
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(approval_no, '|', card_id) AS approvalKey FROM card_transaction WHERE card_id = #{cardId} AND approval_no IS NOT NULL AND approval_no != '' AND transaction_date >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y%m%d')
